reviews.customers_say: Customers like the sweater's style, with one noting it can be dressed up or down, and appreciate its quality, comfort, softness, and warmth. The thickness receives positive feedback, with one customer describing it as medium thick. Customers disagree on whether the sweater is true to size, and several mention the sleeves are too short.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So sharp! A Must Have!
items.body: I get complements every time I wear this! Love the denim sleeves and the print! It looks so luxurious! It would have been twice the price in a regular store! You MUST order this! Read more
items.author: Pamela Oldfield

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater
items.body: Great material, very warm sweater Read more
items.author: Shanette Taylor

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bohemian look for less
items.body: This sweater is very much like something you would find at FreePeople and the quality was actually good. It was lofty and soft to the touch but the sleeves were way too long on me and overall the M was too big. I am usually a XS or S in FreePeople and it told me to order a M so I did but way too big. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality - true to size
items.body: Good quality. But it is not oversized at all, so size up if you want that look feel. Read more
items.author: Bonnie Hardwick

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So cute
items.body: So cute and very heavy Read more
items.author: Becky

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Highly Recommend
items.body: Very thick and comfortable sweater! It kept me warm In 37 degree weather! HIGHLY RECOMMEND. Colors matches the picture, sleeve length was perfect. Read more
items.author: keilan lyons

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT QUALITY
items.body: Okay so I did not have high expectations for this I just love weird pieces and this is PERFECT. It’s very warm I used it as a jacket today in 24°F weather and was fine. The knit is very thick and feels amazing. The only complaint I have is that I wish it was a hair longer, I think it’d make the oversized look better if it was about 2-3” longer on the waist. Overall I’m VERY pleased this is going to be a staple in my closet. Read more
items.author: Courtney Butterfield

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Short Arms
items.body: Cute sweater, but it’s short in the arms. Read more
items.author: Corey Moye

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Karchi Letters, Leopard Black, Black Leopard, Pink, Rose Letters, Blue Letters, Purple Letters, Beige87, Black Letters, Green Letters, Leopard Apricot. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
